attributes.additional_details: See how many schools are closed and see how many students and teachers are in danger. Three in four secondary schools have temporarily shut down to keep the virus away from vulnerable. Why did Germany closed its school for? Why is there a christmas free period? There were more religous festivals that other religion had to celebrate? Isn't that racist?
attributes.background: Close schools for a short period of time in London and the entire UK. This is a risk towards our students and teachers. Many our uk schools are partially closing but yet Gavin is making it illegal. Some parents are vulnerable especially teachers. Vaccine are not a cure to some people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
